MS MCQs

    Use the fixed assets reclassification journal in Dynamics 365 Business Central

    »

    1. For which of the following reasons would you not use the reclassification journal for fixed assets?

      To transfer a fixed asset from one location to another

      To transfer a fixed asset from one dimension to another

      To transfer a fixed asset from one depreciation method to another

      To transfer a fixed asset from one responsible employee to another


    2. What happens when you select Reclassify on the Fixed Asset Reclassification Journal page?

      The reclassification journal lines are posted to the fixed assets ledger and, in case of G/L integration, also to the general ledger.

      New fixed assets are created based on the information on the reclassification journal lines.

      The reclassification journal lines are only posted to the fixed assets ledger. Reclassifying fixed assets never impacts the general ledger.

      Business Central automatically creates lines in the FA G/L journal by using the specified template and batch. Journal lines are used to transfer, split, or combine fixed assets.
